title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.2 - Legal base

State Regulations

The powers and duties of the Division of Alcoholism and

Alcohol Abuse, as set forth in section
19.07, subdivision (a) of the Mental Hygiene Law, include the implementation of a
program of services adapted to the needs and interests of young people as well
as the promotion of programs for the prevention of alcoholism and alcohol
abuse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
305.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
